UI Description: To select of the NDC Scope is conditional or unconditional

UI Description: Upload the design document for the programme

UI Description: Percentage the particular organisation owns of the programme

UI Description: To check if the programme is included in the Nationally Determined Contributions

UI Description: The Cost of the programme

UI Description: Number of credits estimated for the programme

Name: NDC Action
UI Description: Drop down to select the type of NDC Action

UI Description: Fixed field where the value is "Gold Standard"

Name: Mitigation Type (only when NDC Action = Mitigation)
UI Description: Drop down to select the type of Mitigation

Name: User Estimated Credits
UI Description: Credits for the NDC Action as estimated by the user

UI Description: Credit estimate for the NDC action calculated through the credit calculation methodology

Name: Consumer Group (only when Mitigation Type = Solar)
UI Description: Drop down to select the consumer group

Name: Energy Generation (only when Mitigation Type = Solar)
UI Description: The Energy generated through this NDC action

Name: Energy Generation Unit (only when Mitigation Type = Solar)
UI Description: Drop down to select the unit of measurement of the above energy generation

Name: Land Area (only when Mitigation Type = Agriculture)
UI Description: The land area used for this NDC action

Name: Land Area Unit (only when Mitigation Type = Agriculture)
UI Description: Drop down to select the unit of measurement of the above land area

Name: Implementing Agency (only when NDC Action = Adaptation)
UI Description: Drop down to select the implementing agency

Name: Included in NAP
UI Description: To check if the programme is included in the National Adaptation Plan

Name: National Plan Objectives (only when NDC Action = Adaptation)
UI Description: Drop down to select the National Plan Objectives

Name: National Plan Coverage (only when NDC Action = Adaptation)
UI Description: Drop down to select the National Plan Coverage
